languages.text: "Славно. Заложники удержат свою паству от необдуманных поступков".
"Good. The hostages will keep their flock from making rash decisions."
languages.original_text: "Славно. Заложники удержат свою паству от необдуманных поступков".

traits.locale_text: "Good. The hostages will keep their flock from making rash decisions."

languages.text: “很好，有了那些人质，他们的牧群应该就不会鲁莽行事了。”
languages.original_text: "Good. The hostages will keep their flock from making rash decisions."

traits.locale_text: “很好，有了那些人质，他们的牧群应该就不会鲁莽行事了。”

languages.text: «Bien. Los rehenes evitarán que su rebaño tome decisiones precipitadas».
languages.original_text: "Good. The hostages will keep their flock from making rash decisions."

traits.locale_text: «Bien. Los rehenes evitarán que su rebaño tome decisiones precipitadas».

languages.text: 「いいだろう。人質を取れば、集団も軽率な決断を下すことはないだろう」
languages.original_text: "Good. The hostages will keep their flock from making rash decisions."

traits.locale_text: 「いいだろう。人質を取れば、集団も軽率な決断を下すことはないだろう」

languages.text: « Très bien. Si nous les tenons en otages, leurs ouailles ne prendront pas de décisions, disons... irréfléchies. »
languages.original_text: "Good. The hostages will keep their flock from making rash decisions."

traits.locale_text: « Très bien. Si nous les tenons en otages, leurs ouailles ne prendront pas de décisions, disons... irréfléchies. »

languages.text: "Gut. Die Geiseln werden dafür sorgen, dass ihre Gemeinden keine unüberlegten Entscheidungen treffen."
languages.original_text: "Good. The hostages will keep their flock from making rash decisions."

traits.locale_text: "Gut. Die Geiseln werden dafür sorgen, dass ihre Gemeinden keine unüberlegten Entscheidungen treffen."

languages.text: "Güzel. Rehineler, cemaatlerini acele kararlar vermekten alıkoyacaktır."
languages.original_text: "Good. The hostages will keep their flock from making rash decisions."
